base_description: Rectangular, dark red object with metallic accents.
part_description: Two rectangular panels with a horizontal yellow bar centered. Two metallic handles on each side.
internal_interaction_description: The two panels are hinged together, allowing them to open and close. The horizontal yellow bar acts as a central support or decorative feature, maintaining symmetry and balance between the panels.
external_interaction_description: The object can be opened or closed by interacting with the side handles, allowing access to its interior. It may be placed against a wall or within a room, serving as a functional or decorative element.
